page.title: 03WYESIDE ARTS CENTRE,BUILTH.
page.content: Wyeside,one of the oldest buildings in the town,is situated on the banks of the River Wye.It is built of natural stone with a large clock on top.It has recently been renovated and serves as the main entertainment centre for Builth and surrounding district.The main building houses a theatre,cinema,art gallery and bingo hall. Local artists and exhibitors use it as a show-case for their various arts and crafts. In addition to the entertainments, children may receive professional tuition in ballet,modern dance,singing nd classical guitar.On Mondays,part of the centre is used as a market where traders sell their wares to the public. Wyeside also has a restaurant where people can eat and drink in comfort.Children from our school often visit the centre for workshops in art,dance,music,etc..
